entry.title: Create a Jeklly Blog
entry.content:
Environment

ğŸ’»OS: MacOS 13.0
ğŸ”¨ARCH: Apple M1

Install Homebrew

å›½å†…æº

/bin/zsh -c "$(curl -fsSL https://gitee.com/cunkai/HomebrewCN/raw/master/Homebrew.sh)"

å®˜æ–¹æº

/bin/zsh -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/HEAD/install.sh)"

Install Ruby

/usr/bin/ruby -e "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/master/install)"

brew install ruby

Check It

ruby -v
ruby 2.6.10p210 (2022-04-12 revision 67958) [universal.arm64e-darwin22]

Install Jekyll

sudo gem install bundler
sudo gem install -n /usr/local/bin/ jekyll

Chose your blog theme

All in Jekyll Theme Clone the jekyll repository

Run Jekyll to emulation

Config the â€œ__config.ymlâ€ file
And run Jekyll

bundle exec jekyll serve

Then you can view in â€œhttp://127.0.0.1:4000â€

entry.title: Build RISCV Toolchain
entry.content:
Environment

ğŸ’»OS: MacOS 13.0
ğŸ”¨ARCH: Apple M1
ğŸ’¾DISK:Case-sensitive (Very Important)

Install Homebrew

å›½å†…æº

/bin/zsh -c "$(curl -fsSL https://gitee.com/cunkai/HomebrewCN/raw/master/Homebrew.sh)"

å®˜æ–¹æº

/bin/zsh -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/HEAD/install.sh)"

Install Environment

$ brew install python3 gawk gnu-sed gmp mpfr libmpc isl zlib expat texinfo
$ brew tap discoteq/discoteq
$ brew install flock

!!!Add texinfo in your PATH

Config Toolchain

$ mkdir /opt/riscv64
$ ./configure --enable-multilib --prefix=/opt/riscv64

Build Toolchain

$ make install -j8
